id: Will Stacey Abrams get enough votes for runoff in GA governor race?
paragraph: Lauren Groh-Wargo, campaign manager for GA Democratic gubernatorial candidate Stacey Abrams, explains to Ali Velshi  why the campaign filed a lawsuit challenging a rejection of votes and why Abrams is “a candidate and a cause worth voting for.”Nov. 12, 2018© 2018 NBC UNIVERSAL
